Package flixnet

Class Biblioteca

  • java.lang.Object
    • flixnet.Biblioteca
  • public class Biblioteca
extends java.lang.Object
    Class: Biblioteca This class creates an ArrayList for Contents in order to store all of the films and series. Also offers different methods to interact with them.

      Method: Add Series This is used to add a new content (Series) to the ArrayList
      int buscarCoincidencia​(java.lang.String texto)
      Method: Look for a content using the title Used to iterate the ArrayList in order to find a coincidence with the parameter itroduced in the content titles.

      Method: Convert text ("yes"/"no") to boolean

      Method: Print only seen content Used to print from the ArrayList all of our content's titles.

    • Method Detail

      • añadirPelicula

        public void añadirPelicula​(java.lang.String titulo,
                           java.lang.String productora,
                           int anio,
                           int oscars_nomin,
                           int oscars_ganados)
        Method: Add Film This is used to add a new content (film) to the ArrayList
        Parameters:
        titulo - Title of the content
        productora - Publisher of the content
        anio - Year of publication of the content
        oscars_nomin - Number of nominations to the Oscars
        oscars_ganados - Number of Oscars won

      • añadirSerie

        public void añadirSerie​(java.lang.String titulo,
                        java.lang.String productora,
                        int anio,
                        int Ntemporadas,
                        boolean finalizada)
        Method: Add Series This is used to add a new content (Series) to the ArrayList
        Parameters:
        titulo - Title of the content
        productora - Publisher of the content
        anio - Year of publication of the content
        Ntemporadas - Number of seasons
        finalizada - true of false depending if the content is finished or not

      • imprimir

        public void imprimir()
              throws EmptyException
        Method: Print Used to print on the screen all the ArrayList
        Throws:
        EmptyException - If the ArrayList is empty

      • imprimirNoVistos

        public void imprimirNoVistos()
                      throws EmptyException
        Method: Print on screen only seen content Used to print from the ArrayList only the content that has been seen.
        Throws:

        public void imprimirTitulos()
                     throws EmptyException
        Method: Print only seen content Used to print from the ArrayList all of our content's titles.
        Throws:
        EmptyException - If the ArrayList is empty

      • buscarCoincidencia

        public int buscarCoincidencia​(java.lang.String texto)
                       throws EmptyException
        Method: Look for a content using the title Used to iterate the ArrayList in order to find a coincidence with the parameter itroduced in the content titles.
        Parameters:
        texto - Title of the Content
        Returns:
        Index of Content
        Throws:
        EmptyException - If the ArrayList is empty

      • conversorBoolean

        public boolean conversorBoolean​(java.lang.String text)
                         throws ConversorBooleanException
        Method: Convert text ("yes"/"no") to boolean
        Parameters:
        text - "yes" or "no"
        Returns:
        true of false
        Throws:
        ConversorBooleanException - If the user don't use a valid option
